row.process: :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') :PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# = "AUTH_TOKEN" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_AUTH_TOKEN# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_HPQC_AUTH_TOKEN#,,"TOP" : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
